logs: A New Home - Migrated to Vercel.
Introducing Materio Originals.

New Reading Mode - Inversion.

A New Home - Migrated to Vercel.
Introducing Materio Originals.
Added Table of Contents sidebar in the insightroom.
New Reading Mode - Inversion.
Option to clear all Data.
Bug Fix - Shake-scroll in insightroom.
Bug Fix - Search not working.
AI Search was optimised so you can now ask something like `what to read?`, `resources with basics of turing machines` etc. and get suggestions based on it.
Improved user experience by revamping the items in reading card.
Little improvements to PDF loading logic to reduce lag.
SQUIRCLES!!!! - Feel the Smooth Consistent UI
Adressed known bugs
Local Resources - Load files locally on-device (Available to Super tier)
Service Worker updated - Made offline experience better
Little changes to UI
Experimental migration to Hugeicons
Local Resources - Load files locally on-device (Available to Super tier)
Service Worker updated - Made offline experience better
Introducing Materio Plus!
Get Exclusive perks as a plus user that normal user's won't get.
Materio will now show ads, Plus user's can get ad-free experience.
You can now choose to disable homepage insightroom feed from settings.
Introducing four all new background wallpaper options - Dynamic (changes scenes depending on the time of the day.), Zen, Blissful night and Dusk.
Improvements made in the Insightroom UI and printable's template.
Additions fixes here and there.
Perfomance optimisations made in oread.
UX improvements
Upgraded icons to FontAwesome 7.0 Pro
The Insightroom is now publicly available.
Security Patch - 1 to for CVE-2025-6442 and other vulnerabilities.
The InsightRoom Overhaul and Moved to Public via sharable links.
The InsightRoom posts can be shared or downloaded to printable ebook.
Bug Fixes to Admin CMS - uploading binary files like pdf were overwritten or getting corrupted.
UX - navigation to profile and settings can be done from any page now
Other minor improvements
Changed Default set Semester
Maintainance check updates
Deprecation of AI Chat from open beta due to rate limit issues and unsatisfatory outputs.
Improved Performance and UX interactions.
Promotional modals can now be dismissed by clicking on remind me later or don't show again.
InsightRoom rolling out for invited users with public posts generally available via link, however InsightRoom is still in beta and may contain bugs.
Fixed aggressive PWA caching issue completely.
Improved update detection and notification system.
Performance and Stability Improvements.
Performance and Stability Improvements.
UX Enhancements.
Materio Account - Get access to latest feature's first (Limited invite based signup's for now).
Texture's and Overlays.
3 New Reading Modes.
- 1. Paper Mode - paper-like texture overlay with option to adjust grain size.
- 2. Night Mode - reduces eye stress with option to control warmth, and auto schedule.
- 3. E-ink Mode - grayscale filter to relax eyes for kindle like experience (best when combined with paper mode).
Contribute Materials.
New ui in settings for easy navigation.
Swipe - a new way to navigate through pages on mobile with haptic feedback.
Re-introduced blogs
Updated terms in license.
Bug Fix - text color and remove blue highlight on tap.
Introduced - Materio Webapp (PWA).
Serverless Functions Integrations
Materio REST APIs introduced for Auth
Introduced Blogs - The InsightRoom
Overall Restructuring and Enhancements to codebase
Performance Improvements
Visual Refresh 2.0 - enhanced UI with Glassmorphism style.
New wordmark - stylized as: materio.
Ghibli Aesthetic - Studio Ghibli inspired art.
Notification Badge - every notification counts.
Addition to Settings
- option to disable background images.
- option to opt out of optional cookies.
Bug Fix - when submit was clicked without selecting options alert for selecting options were given twice.
Bug Fix - Background image wasn't adapting to viewport automatically needing to refresh.

Visual Refresh - Materio now has a new look.
Faster - loading new pages takes less time now with tabs.
Introduction of Categories menu - for easy selection and organization of material type.
New PDF viewer and style for better view size with an option of Fullscreen mode.

Notification Badges - You can see badge with counts whenever theres a new notification.
Dark mode - toggle on/off in settings.

Materio v4
Visual overhaul
Introduced Jekyll templating
Font Awesome V6 Icons in the Navbar instead of text enhancing visual appearance
Introduced Blogs with Markdown formatting (Limited Access only for now)
Consistent UI across all Materio Pages
Bug Fixes and optimisations
Secure: The passwords are hashed before storing.
*Consistent UI includes only Home, Chat and Changelog sections of the site.
*Blogs uses Customised flavor of Minima V3 Jekyll template.
*Blogs access is currently limited to only authorised credentials, if you want access you can signup for the waitlist by sending mail to support.
